segments.text: What kind of jobs have you had ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been a Production Manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many years have you worked as a Production Manager ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to tell me something about your outstanding achievements ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had introduced an advanced product line , which increased the output and lessened the cost .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wonderful . Then how many employers have you worked for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Frankly speaking , three . If your company employs me , it will be my fourth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then have you received any award at your present company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was awarded the title of Advanced Worker last year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would you evaluate the company you are with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Although I could not say that everything is perfect there , I still very much appreciate what the company has given me , especial many chances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would your colleagues evaluate you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They would say I am a responsible friend and a capable colleague .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you get recommendations from your present employers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have brought them with me . Here they are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that you have covered all the important points already.But if I have any questions later I will contact you .
segments.speaker: S2
